channel.title: Playing RS at school
channel.description: I got the proxy thing down, but what doens't work is the server. Th wireless server at school doesn't allow any form of outside servers(e.g.)If in halo, it won't let reach outside internet servers. So I was wondering some socket servers programs or something like that can be used to bypass? Kinda of a Proxy for the server itself.[br][size=1]Posted at: May 01, 2006, 06:32:25 am[/size][hr]Can I get the port and IP address for runescape?[br][size=1]Posted at: May 01, 2006, 07:51:03 am[/size][hr]Does a port scanner have to do with anything? Coz I put it to enable rs port and ip. Will it work?

item.title: Playing RS at school
item.dc:creator: @saben saben
item.description:
@saben wrote:

Well, if it blocks the website, it can be bypassed. At least at my schools comps. Restart the comp with the network cable unplugged and then log in. Once logged in and everything is loaded, plug it back in. It works at my school, not sure bout yours.

Read full topic

item.title: Playing RS at school
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

Runescape also uses port 43595 (yes its different look at the end number ;)) to load the animations though i don’t know why’d you want to play at school… Just use a private server and trick all your friends that you hacked Zezima funnier and funner.

Read full topic
